<template>
  <TopOfPage></TopOfPage>
  <TopAndServicesDivider></TopAndServicesDivider>
  <ServicesComp></ServicesComp>
</template>

<script>
import TopOfPage from './components/TopOfPage.vue'
import TopAndServicesDivider from './components/TopAndServicesDivider.vue'
import ServicesComp from './components/ServicesComp.vue'
export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    TopOfPage,
    TopAndServicesDivider,
    ServicesComp
  }
}
</script>

<style>
*{
	padding: 0;
	margin: 0;
	box-sizing: border-box;
}
body{
	overflow-x: hidden;
	scroll-behavior: smooth;
}
.wrap{
	width: 100%;
  min-height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
	background-color: #FCFCFC;
}
.conteiner{
	max-width:  1600px;
	min-height: 300px;
  min-height: 100vh;
	background-color: #FCFCFC;
	overflow-x: hidden;
}

.Paje2{
	width: 100%;
	height: 50px;
	display: flex;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: flex-start;
	padding-right: 100px;
	.bloobs{
		position: relative;
		right: 200px;
	}
}
.Paje2-boolb{
	width: 100%;
	height: 50px;
	display: flex;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: flex-start;
	padding-right: 100px;
	.bloobs{
		position: relative;
		right: 200px;
	}
}






.Pjae-ilustation{
	width: 100%;
	height: auto;
	margin-top: 200px;
	padding: 0 135px;
	display: flex;
	.left-box{
		width: 50%;
		height: auto;
	}
	.right-box{
		width: 50%;
		height: auto;
		padding-left: 40px;
		.main__text-small{
			display: flex;
			font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
			font-style: normal;
			font-weight: 500;
			font-size: 28px;
			line-height: 40px;
			color: #F78CB6;
			p{
				position: relative;
				bottom: 23px;
				margin-left: 7px;
			}
			.main__line{
				width: 36px;
				height: 3px;
				background: #F78CB6;
			}
		}
		h3{
			margin-top: 5px;
			font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
			font-style: normal;
			font-weight: 700;
			font-size: 48px;
			line-height: 74px;
			color: #56597A;

		}
		.main__description{
			font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
			font-style: normal;
			font-weight: 400;
			font-size: 20px;
			line-height: 32px;
			letter-spacing: 0.02em;
			color: #919299;
			margin-top: 20px;
		}
		.main__btn{
			width: 216px;
			height: 66px;
			background: #F78BB6;
			border-radius: 4px;
			margin-top: 40px;
			display: flex;
			align-items: center;
			justify-content: space-between;
			padding-right: 17px;
			padding-left: 22px;
			font-style: normal;
			font-weight: 500;
			font-size: 20px;
			line-height: 30px;
			letter-spacing: 0.02em;
			color: #FFFFFF;
			font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
			border: none;
			cursor: pointer;
			transition: 1s;
		}
		.main__btn:hover{
			background: #000000;
			transition: 0.4s;
		}

	}
	}
	.Paje-boolbs{
		width: 100%;
		height: 50px;
		display: flex;
		align-items: center;
		justify-content: flex-end;
		margin-top: 100px;
		.bloobs2{
			position: relative;
			left: 160px;
		}
	}

font-weight: 400;
font-size: 16px;
line-height: 32px;
color: #ABABAB;
.Paje6__box-line{

	}
}

	}

.Paje7{
	width: 100%;
	height: auto;
	margin-top: 160px;
	padding: 0 135px;
	display: flex;
	.left{
		width: 40%;

	}

	}

	}
}
.Paje8{
	width: 100%;
	height: auto;
	display: flex;
	margin-top: 120px;
	.Paje8__left{
		width: 20%;

	}
	.Paje8__uppprostred{
		width: 60%;
		height: 300px;
		display: flex;
		flex-direction: column;
		align-items: center;
		padding-top: 23px;
		h5{
			font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
font-style: normal;
font-weight: 700;
font-size: 36px;
line-height: 72px;
color: #56597A;

		}
		.Paje8__description{
			font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
			font-style: normal;
			font-weight: 400;

			color: #919299;
			margin-top: 18px;
			padding: 0 85px;
		}
		.Paje8__email{
			width: 706px;
			height: 82px;
			background: #FFFFFF;
			border-radius: 4px;
			margin-top: 15px;
			display: flex;
			align-items: center;
			justify-content: space-between;
			padding-left: 27px;
			padding-right: 13px;
			box-shadow: 0px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13);
			input{
				width: 300px;
				height: 100%;
			font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;		
				font-style: normal;
				font-weight: 400;
				font-size: 18px;
				line-height: 32px;
				color: #D2D2D2;

				border: none;

			}

			font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;

			}

			}

	}

}
.footer{
	width: 100%;
	height: 450px;
	margin-top: 160px;
	.top{
		width: 100%;
		height: 90%;
		background-image: url(../img/foter__right.png);
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	background-position: top  center;
	background-size: cover;
	display: flex;
	padding: 0 135px;
	.footer__left{
		width: 45%;
		height: 100%;
		padding-top: 100px;
		.logo__foter{
			font-family: 'Josefin Sans';

			 span{

			}

		}

		}

		}

			display: flex;

			justify-content: space-between;

			.sociable__box{

				background: #FFFFFF;
				margin-top: 16px;
				display: flex;
				align-items: center;
				justify-content: center;
				border-radius: 50%;
				cursor: pointer;
			}
		}
	}
	.footer__right{
		width: 55%;
		height: 100%;
		display: flex;
		padding-top: 100px;
		justify-content: space-between;
		.footer__box-right{

			.footer__main-text{
				font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;		
				font-style: normal;

				line-height: 32px;
				letter-spacing: 0.02em;
				color: #56597A;
			}
			.foterr__text-right{

				line-height: 32px;
				letter-spacing: 0.02em;
				color: #919299;
				margin-top: 25px;
			}
			.footer__padding{
				margin-top: 37px;
			}
		}
	}
	}
	.down{

			}

				font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;		
font-style: normal;
font-weight: 450;
font-size: 14px;
line-height: 24px;
letter-spacing: 0.02em;
outline: none;
background-color: transparent;
border: none;
color: #FCFCFC;
cursor: pointer;
			}
.op {
    background-color: transparent;

    border: none;
    background-color: rgba(101, 100, 100, 1);

		font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;

    cursor: pointer;
}

	}
